Classes in fs.fibu2.filter used by fs.fibu2.filter
DateFilter
          Filters entries according to their date
EntryFilter
          An EntryFilter is an object which can filter entries according to a certain criterion.
EntryFilterEditor
          An EntryFilterEditor provides a graphical interface for editing a filter.
FilterPool
          Several JournalModules use StackFilters for their views and sometimes it might be useful to copy an existing filter into another module without the need to recreate it from scratch.
FilterPool.StackFilterTripel
          An information tripel containing a filter, its creator module and its name
StackFilter
          This class implements a stack of filters.
StandardFilterComponent.Selection
           
 

Classes in fs.fibu2.filter used by fs.fibu2.filter.event
StandardFilterComponent
          This class implements the standard component, which is used by all standard fsfibu2 EntryFilters.
StandardFilterComponent.Selection

          This class implements a stack of filters.
